_meta.notes: 58 output fields (is_output=true) match Spec D.4 exactly. 6 helper fields (is_output=false) are fetched as dependencies but not counted in output.

fields.name: net_liquidity
fields.notes: Berechnet aus WALCL - TGA - RRP. WALCL/TGA nur woechentlich. RRP taeglich.

fields.name: walcl
fields.notes: Total Assets Federal Reserve. Updated Mi. Subject to FRED revisions.

fields.name: tga
fields.notes: Treasury-Konto. Faellt bei Ausgaben, steigt bei Auktionen. Volatile.

fields.name: rrp
fields.notes: Overnight Reverse Repo. Faellt von >2T auf <500B = Liquiditaets-Freisetzung.

fields.name: mmf_assets
fields.notes: Dry Powder an der Seitenlinie. Sinkend = Geld fliesst in Risk Assets.

fields.name: spread_2y10y
fields.notes: Markt-Konsens YC. max_daily_move_pct=999 weil Feld um 0 schwankt.

fields.name: spread_3m10y
fields.notes: Akademisch staerkerer Rezessions-Indikator. Jede Rezession seit 1960.

fields.name: real_10y_yield
fields.notes: Treibt Gold invers, Tech-Bewertungen invers, Duration-Assets.

fields.name: hy_oas
fields.notes: High Yield Option-Adjusted Spread. Kernindikator fuer Credit Stress.

fields.name: ig_oas
fields.notes: IG reagiert FRUEHER als HY. SVB 2023: IG bewegte sich vor HY.

fields.name: nfci
fields.notes: Composite aus 105 Financial Indicators. Negativ=loose, Positiv=tight.

fields.name: anfci
fields.notes: DEGRADIERT von T1 auf T3. >0.9 Korrelation mit NFCI. Weiterhin abrufen, nicht gescored.

fields.name: discount_window
fields.notes: SVB-Fruehwarnung 2 Tage vor Bank Run. Sprung = Banken-Funding-Stress.

fields.name: vix

source_llm_config.extraction_prompt: Find the CURRENT CBOE VIX index closing level. Return ONLY: {"value": <number>, "date": "<date>", "source_url": "<url>"}. Normal range: 10-30. If not findable, return {"value": null}.

fields.notes: CBOE Volatility Index. VIX = 65 bei JPY-Crash Aug 2024.

fields.name: vix_term_ratio
fields.notes: >1.0=Contango (normal). <1.0=Backwardation (Panik).

fields.name: pc_ratio_equity

source_scrape.notes: Equity Only - NICHT Total, nicht Index.

source_llm_config.search_query: CBOE equity put call ratio today
source_llm_config.extraction_prompt: Find the CURRENT CBOE equity-only put/call ratio. Return ONLY: {"value": <number>, "date": "<date>", "source_url": "<url>"}. Normal range: 0.5-1.2. If not findable, return {"value": null}.

fields.notes: T1 mit fragiler Quelle. FRED PCCE als Sekundaer (1d Lag). LLM als Stufe 4.

fields.name: iv_rv_spread
fields.notes: Positiv=normale Angstpraemie. Negativ=Komplacenz (GEFAHR).

fields.name: pct_above_200dma
fields.notes: FRAGILSTES Feld. 500 Ticker via yfinance. Batch: 10x50, 2s Pause.

fields.name: nh_nl
fields.notes: S&P500-basiert. Nutzt gleiche Ticker-Daten wie #18.

fields.name: spy_tlt_corr_21d
fields.notes: EXISTENZIELL fuer V16. >0=Diversifikation bricht. 2022: SPY+TLT beide -20%.

fields.name: naaim_exposure

source_llm_config.extraction_prompt: Find the latest NAAIM Exposure Index reading. Return ONLY: {"value": <number>, "survey_date": "<date>", "source_url": "<url>"}. Range: typically 20-120. If not findable, return {"value": null}.

fields.notes: >90=Crowding-Risiko. <30=Kapitulation (contrarian bullish).

fields.name: aaii_bull_bear

source_llm_config.search_query: AAII sentiment survey latest bull bear spread
source_llm_config.extraction_prompt: Find the latest AAII Investor Sentiment Survey bull-bear spread (% Bullish minus % Bearish). Return ONLY: {"value": <number>, "survey_date": "<date>", "source_url": "<url>"}. Range: -50 to +50 typically. If not findable, return {"value": null}.

fields.notes: >+30=Euphorie. <-20=Angst (contrarian bullish). Allein schwach, mit NAAIM stark.

fields.name: cot_es_leveraged

source_scrape.notes: Disaggregated Futures Only. Leveraged Funds Kategorie.

source_llm_config.search_query: CFTC COT S&P 500 E-mini leveraged funds net position latest
source_llm_config.extraction_prompt: Find the latest CFTC Commitments of Traders leveraged funds net position for S&P 500 E-mini futures (contract 13874A). Can be positive or negative. Return ONLY: {"value": <number>, "date": "<date>", "source_url": "<url>"}. If not findable, return {"value": null}.

fields.notes: Leveraged Funds = HF/CTA. Zeigt Fast-Money-Crowding.

fields.name: cot_zn_leveraged

source_scrape.notes: Gleiche Quelle wie #23, anderer Contract Code.

source_llm_config.search_query: CFTC COT 10-Year Treasury Note leveraged funds net position latest
source_llm_config.extraction_prompt: Find the latest CFTC Commitments of Traders leveraged funds net position for 10-Year Treasury Note futures (contract 043602). Can be positive or negative. Return ONLY: {"value": <number>, "date": "<date>", "source_url": "<url>"}. If not findable, return {"value": null}.

fields.notes: Duration-Positioning der Fast Money. ES+ZN decken Equity+Rates ab.

fields.name: dxy

source_llm_config.extraction_prompt: Find the CURRENT US Dollar Index (DXY) level. Return ONLY: {"value": <number>, "date": "<date>", "source_url": "<url>"}. Normal range: 90-115. If not findable, return {"value": null}.

fields.notes: EUR 57.6% Gewicht. DXY zeigt JPY-Events NICHT gut. Daher USDJPY zusaetzlich.

fields.name: cu_au_ratio
fields.notes: Steigend=Growth-Optimismus. Fallend=Safety-Flucht. In Teil B als T1 gelistet, in D.4 Global T1=2 (DXY+USDJPY) impliziert T2.

fields.name: china_10y

source_llm_config.search_query: China 10 year government bond yield today
source_llm_config.extraction_prompt: Find the CURRENT China 10-year government bond yield. Return ONLY: {"value": <number>, "date": "<date>", "source_url": "<url>"}. Normal range: 2.0-4.0%. If not findable, return {"value": null}.

fields.notes: FRAGIL. yfinance instabil. EODHD oder investing.com als Backup.

fields.name: usdcnh
fields.notes: Steigend=Yuan-Schwaeche/Kapitalflucht. China 10Y=Policy, USDCNH=Kapitalfluss.

fields.name: usdjpy
fields.notes: NEU in V2. Carry-Trade-Proxy. Aug 2024 JPY-Event war NICHT in DXY sichtbar.

fields.name: wti_curve
fields.notes: >1.0=Contango (Ueberangebot). <1.0=Backwardation (Knappheit). Futures-Kalender-Modul noetig.

fields.name: v16_state
fields.notes: Liest: state, confluence (0-10), dd_level (%), net_long (%).

fields.name: v16_state_history_30d
fields.notes: Haeufiges Wechseln = unsicherer Markt, wenig Conviction.

fields.name: f6_positions
fields.notes: Welche F6 Positionen sind offen und wie ist die Win Rate.

fields.name: agent0_confidence_yesterday
fields.notes: Trend der eigenen Confidence. Fallend = System unsicher.

fields.name: last_ks_trigger
fields.notes: Wann wurde zuletzt ein Kill Switch ausgeloest? Systemstress-Historie.

fields.name: dq_summary
fields.notes: NEU in V2. fields_ok/stale/failed/anomaly, sources_status, data_quality_level, cache_status, cost_today, alerts.

fields.name: fed_funds_rate
fields.notes: HELPER — Input fuer fedwatch_cut_prob(#52) und IC FED_POLICY Interface. Nicht eigenstaendig gescored.

fields.name: gdpnow

source_llm_config.extraction_prompt: Find the latest Atlanta Fed GDPNow GDP growth estimate. Return ONLY: {"value": <number>, "date": "<date>", "source_url": "<url>"}. Value is annualized % growth rate, typically -5 to +10. If not findable, return {"value": null}.

fields.notes: Nowcast des laufenden Quartals-GDP. Aktualisiert bei jedem wichtigen Datenrelease.

fields.name: ism_mfg

source_llm_config.extraction_prompt: Find the latest ISM Manufacturing PMI reading. Return ONLY: {"value": <number>, "date": "<date>", "source_url": "<url>"}. Value typically 30-65, below 50 = contraction. If not findable, return {"value": null}.

fields.notes: IC RECESSION Divergenz braucht es. <50=Kontraktion. FRED MANEMP als Proxy.

fields.name: baltic_dry

source_llm_config.extraction_prompt: Find the CURRENT Baltic Dry Index (BDI) level. Return ONLY: {"value": <number>, "date": "<date>", "source_url": "<url>"}. Normal range: 500-5000. If not findable, return {"value": null}.

fields.notes: FRAGIL. Global Trade Proxy. Steigend=Wirtschaft expandiert.

fields.name: brent_wti_spread
fields.notes: Steigend=Global Supply Tightness. Fallend=US Shale Ueberschuss.

fields.name: jgb_10y

source_llm_config.search_query: Japan 10 year government bond yield JGB today
source_llm_config.extraction_prompt: Find the CURRENT Japan 10-year government bond yield. Return ONLY: {"value": <number>, "date": "<date>", "source_url": "<url>"}. Normal range: 0.0-2.0%. If not findable, return {"value": null}.

fields.notes: HELPER — BOJ Policy Monitor. Ergaenzt USDJPY fuer Japan-Exposure. Nicht in 58 Output-Zaehlung.

fields.name: insider_ratio

source_scrape.notes: SEC EDGAR Form 4 filings. Aufwendig zu parsen.

source_llm_config.search_query: insider buying selling ratio this week
source_llm_config.extraction_prompt: Find the latest aggregate insider buy/sell ratio for US stocks. Return ONLY: {"value": <number>, "date": "<date>", "source_url": "<url>"}. Ratio > 1 = more buying. If not findable, return {"value": null}.

fields.notes: HELPER — Fragiles Parsing. Nicht in 58 Output-Zaehlung. Contrarian-Signal bei Extremen.

fields.name: gpr_index

source_llm_config.search_query: geopolitical risk index GPR latest monthly
source_llm_config.extraction_prompt: Find the latest Geopolitical Risk (GPR) Index value. Normal range: 50-250, spikes to 400+ during crises. Return ONLY: {"value": <number>, "date": "<date>", "source_url": "<url>"}. If not findable, return {"value": null}.

fields.notes: Geopolitischer Risiko-Index. Spikes bei Kriegen, Terroranschlaegen, etc.

fields.name: spy_fwd_pe

source_llm_config.extraction_prompt: Find the CURRENT S&P 500 forward P/E ratio. Return ONLY: {"value": <number>, "date": "<date>", "source_url": "<url>"}. Normal range: 15-25. If not findable, return {"value": null}.

fields.notes: FRAGIL. yfinance .info Feld. Kann sich aendern oder verschwinden.

fields.name: sofr_rate
fields.notes: HELPER — Input fuer sofr_ff_spread(#61). SOFR - DFF = Funding Stress.

fields.name: days_to_fomc
fields.notes: Statisch aus Kalender berechnet. CIO braucht dieses Feld.

fields.name: days_to_opex
fields.notes: 3. Freitag des Monats. Gamma-Exposure beeinflusst Markt nahe OpEx.

fields.name: earnings_season_flag
fields.formula: True if within earnings season window
fields.notes: Earnings Season: ~2. Woche Jan/Apr/Jul/Okt fuer 5-6 Wochen.

fields.name: fedwatch_cut_prob

source_llm_config.search_query: CME FedWatch tool probability next FOMC rate cut
source_llm_config.extraction_prompt: Find the CURRENT CME FedWatch implied probability of a rate CUT at the next FOMC meeting. Return ONLY: {"value": <number>, "meeting_date": "<date>", "source_url": "<url>"}. Value is percentage 0-100. If not findable, return {"value": null}.

fields.formula: Implied Rate = 100 - ZQ Future Price; Prob Cut = (Current FFR - Implied Rate) / 0.25 * 100
fields.notes: KRITISCH — IC FED_POLICY Divergenz ist BLIND ohne dieses Feld.

fields.name: spy_rel_volume
fields.notes: NEU. >1.5=ueberdurchschnittlich, <0.5=ungewoehnlich ruhig.

fields.name: trin
fields.notes: NEU. >2.0=Kapitulations-Selling. <0.5=Euphorie. Starkes Contrarian-Signal.

fields.name: hyg_tlt_ratio
fields.notes: NEU. HY OAS misst SPREAD-Level. HYG/TLT misst FLOW-Direction.

fields.name: spy_intraday_range
fields.notes: NEU. Versteckte Volatilitaet die VIX nicht zeigt.

fields.name: initial_claims
fields.notes: UPGRADE von T3 zu T2. Einziges Real-Economy-Feld mit woechentlicher Frequenz. FRED Revision-Detection aktiv.

fields.name: vix_call_put_vol

source_scrape.notes: VIX options volume. Gleiche Quelle wie #16 P/C Ratio.

source_llm_config.search_query: VIX options volume call put ratio today
source_llm_config.extraction_prompt: Find today's VIX options call-to-put volume ratio. Return ONLY: {"value": <number>, "date": "<date>", "source_url": "<url>"}. Normal range: 0.5-2.0. If not findable, return {"value": null}.

fields.notes: NEU. Hohe VIX-Call-Volume = institutionelles Hedging-Demand.

fields.name: breakeven_5y5y
fields.notes: IC INFLATION Divergenz braucht dieses Feld. Fed's bevorzugtes Mass.

fields.name: move_index

source_llm_config.search_query: MOVE index bond volatility today level
source_llm_config.extraction_prompt: Find the CURRENT ICE BofA MOVE Index level (bond market volatility). Return ONLY: {"value": <number>, "date": "<date>", "source_url": "<url>"}. Normal: 80-120. If not findable, return {"value": null}.

fields.notes: VIX fuer Bonds. SVB Fruehwarnung: MOVE stieg Tage vor VIX.

fields.name: sofr_ff_spread
fields.notes: Normal: 0-5 bps. Bei Stress: >10 bps. Bei Krise (Sep 2019): >25 bps.

fields.name: cpi_yoy

source_llm_config.search_query: US CPI year over year inflation rate latest
source_llm_config.extraction_prompt: Find the latest US CPI year-over-year inflation rate (percentage). Return ONLY: {"value": <number>, "date": "<date>", "source_url": "<url>"}. Normal range: 0-10%. If not findable, return {"value": null}.

fields.formula: YoY % Change berechnet aus monatlichen CPI-Werten
fields.notes: IC INFLATION Divergenz braucht CPI als Markt-Realitaet vs. IC-Konsens.

fields.name: days_to_cpi
fields.notes: Market Analyst Catalyst-Kalender erwartet dieses Feld.

fields.name: days_to_nfp
fields.notes: Non-Farm Payrolls. Erster Freitag des Monats.

fields.name: days_to_ecb
fields.notes: HELPER — ECB Zinsentscheidung. Geholt aber nicht in 58 Output-Zaehlung.

fields.name: days_to_boj
fields.notes: HELPER — BOJ Zinsentscheidung. Aug 2024 zeigte: BOJ-Events koennen systemisch sein.
